All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BeansConfigurations
The Configuration manages the singleton beans of the project.
Board
A Board entity.
Board.Options
Options for the board type.
BoardRepository
The boards' repository
BoardService
The service is an api to the boards DB.
DbError
The exception that thrown when there is a problem to find the user's room and the game's generic exception.
DefaultController
The controller handles the root requests.
Ex5TemplateApplication
Spring boot application.
Ex5TemplateApplicationTests
 
FiltersConfig
 
FinishGameFilter
The Filter makes sure that after the user has finished the game and the finish page displayed, he will be removed from the room.
GameController
The Controller handles the rests related to the game management.
GameFilter
The filter was meant to handle situation that a player sent an "in game related" rest and the room is not full but because of an error discovered too close to the submission deadline, we decided to disable the filter's functionality.
GameOver
The exception thrown in case there is attempt to reach any of the rooms rest and the game been finished.
InRoomFilter
The filter makes sure that if a player (which means a user inside a room) enters pages that aren't in game related, he will be removed from its room.
InvalidChoiceError
The exception thrown in case there is attempt to preform an invalid action at the game.
LobbyController
The lobby controller
LoginController
The login controller
NewUser
The Component is how the register page's form received.
OnRoomFilter
Filter to /game/init - handle with many kinds of situations that can happen when getting to this route.
Player
A player entity
Player.PlayerStatus
The enum is the available player's statuses.
PlayerRepository
The players' repository
PlayerService
The member service acts like an api to the players DB.
RestGameController
The controller manages the rests related to the game.
Room
The Room class represents a game room where players can join and play a game.
Room.RoomEnum
Enumerates the possible states of the room.
RoomLockHandler
The component manages a dict of locks so each room in the database will have its own lock.
RoomRepository
The repository of the room.
RoomService
Service class for managing rooms in the game.
Submarine
The `Submarine` class represents a submarine entity in a game.
SubmarineRepository
The repository of the submarine.
TempForGameController
Just a test to do some tests and also print all the data bases.
Tile
This class represents a Tile entity in the game, which can be part of a Submarine or empty.
Tile.TileStatus
The status for each tile
TileRepository
The repository of the tiles.
UpdateObject
An update object includes maps for the update array in room.
UsersConfig
The config manages the user registration, login, and users permissions.
UserTurn
The class is the user's turn's action.
